column5: I would give my LEFT NUT to be there!!
Man that is cool!    my arms would be so sore by the end of the day!    Sweet!!!

you should see them here in the Cheasapeake when they blow out balls of bait. It is cast, hook catch, start the boat and follow repeat till you are tired. We call it gun and run as you look to the sky for diving birds then you just follow the school until the action stops.   Art
I used to go to the Cheasapeake a lot growing up... fishing for PORGY, then when I got older.... eventually for BLUES!!  I LOVED GOING THERE!!
Incredible     That's what a ball of fish bait looks like Man them little minnows sure got their territory shorten by those Blues Thanks for sharing Leechman
Go there and you might lose it anyway....
Roy is correct them boyz gots teeth!

How come this never happens to me when I'm surf fishing in Cape Cod?!   Somewhere I've got a picture of a 13 pound PORGY I caught is South Florida a few years back that would have been an IGFA record if the rod hadn't been handed to me from a charter boat captain   would have beat the old record by almost 5 pounds!  -Ben
